text: Timi tiniharuko marganirdesanako lagi jim'mevara chainau, baru allahale nai jasala'i cahancha, marganirdesana gardacha. Ra timile juna asala mala kharca garnechau, tyasako pha'ida timila'i nai hunecha. Ra timile allahako sadiccha hasila garna matra kharca garnupardacha. Timile jejati kharca garchau, tyasako pura pratiphala timila'i di'inecha ra timro kunai prakarako haka marine chaina
